tool.name: Get an OAuth token to access LDC data
tool.help:
**What it does**
Retrieves an authorization token from the `Linguistic Data Consortium <https://ldc.upenn.edu/>`_ to verify access privileges to LDC data.
.. class:: warningmark
To obtain Gigaword documents you **must**:
1. Be an LDC licensee 2. Obtain an OAuth Token
You can obtain an OAuth token by visting `THIS LINK <https://grid.anc.org:9443/ldc-authorize/>`_ and logging in with your LDC id and password. Then paste the OAuth token into the above field and click `execute`. This will add an item to your history that supplies the OAuth token to LDC datasource services that require it.
